data.title: Very slow and dirty
data.text: The times I've been there it's been very uncomfortable. I have nothing against people who beg for money but every time I've been there I've been harassed by people asking me for money.mthembathrooms are very dirty, service is slow.  The parking is usually full. Drive thru makes lots of mistakes with orders

data.title: Best Nutritious Foods
data.text:
One of the best menu of chicken in my life.  The excellent condiments were free and unlimited.  

The staff in all the branches we visited were excellent in customer service, friendliness and the performance of their tasks in all functions.  All branches were clean.  Restroom was clean and well supplied.

My wife, son and myself were always excited to dine at El Pollo Loco for our lunch and dinner.

data.title: Ran out of chicken
data.text: I have visited this location numerous times, but the last two times were absolutely the worst. I was about an hour and a half before closing and twice they have ran out of chicken

data.title: El Shyza!
data.text: Love me Some Loco! Try the "Shrimp & Avocado Burrito + Shredded Chicken" it's my own invention.  Enjoy!
